title: French Travel Guide
homeWelcome: Welcome to the French Travel Guide
noTownSelected: Please search or click on a town to view its description.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view bookmarks.

homeIntro: Discover the beauty and charm of France
heroSubtitle: Explore the most beautiful cities, landmarks, and hidden gems across France
aboutDescription1: Welcome to your ultimate travel companion for exploring France. Our interactive map allows you to discover cities, attractions, and local insights throughout the country.
aboutDescription2: Whether you're planning your first visit to Paris or looking to explore the hidden gems of Provence, our guide provides comprehensive information to make your journey unforgettable.
featuredDescription: Explore some of France's most popular destinations
parisBrief: The City of Light offers iconic landmarks, world-class museums, and charming neighborhoods.
niceBrief: Experience the beauty of the French Riviera with stunning beaches and Mediterranean charm.
lyonBrief: Discover France's gastronomic capital with its historic old town and vibrant culture.
step1Description: Click on any city on our interactive map of France to begin exploring.
step2Description: Get comprehensive information about the city, including attractions, history, and local tips.
step3Description: Use our recommendations to create your perfect itinerary for visiting France.
ctaDescription: Start your journey by exploring our interactive map and discovering the wonders of France.
footerAboutText: France Travel Guide is dedicated to helping travelers discover the beauty and culture of France through our interactive map and comprehensive city guides.
logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to log out?
locationSentence: Located in the {{department}} department of {{region}}, France.
noInfoMessage: Not much information is known about {{town}}, it may just be a peaceful hidden gem. Try reloading the town.
